title: 789: BITCOIN CAN BE WORTH OVER $2M PER COIN IF BTC CAPTURES JUST 5% OF THE MARKET CAP ON THIS CHART!!
description:
Right now, with the Bitcoin market cap sitting just under $1 trillion, BTC is only a very tiny fraction of the world's assets combined.

So in the grand scheme of crypto, this is why many analyst believe we're still so early.

"If Bitcoin captures just 5% of the market cap of other assets on this chart, it'll be worth over $2M/coin."

For complete show notes and for the full premium experience with video, visit YT channel at: http://CryptoNewsAlerts.net
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
